ocremixupdater
Class ReMixDatabase

java.lang.Object
  ocremixupdater.ReMixDatabase

public class ReMixDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

A database holding records for OC ReMixes.

Also holds a list of mirrors.

Can read from and write to a list file, and check the list against the mp3s in a folder. Maintains the ReMixes sorted in descending order.

addRecord

public void addRecord(int number,
                      java.lang.String name)
Add a record to the database.

If a ReMix with the given number already exists:

  • If that ReMix is marked as "have", do nothing.
  • Otherwise, update that ReMix's name to the given name.
Otherwise, add a new OCReMix with the given name and number in the proper place.

Parameters:
number - The ReMix's OCR number.
name - The ReMix's filename.

countGet

public int countGet()
Count the number of ReMixes marked to be downloaded.

Returns:
The number of ReMixes to get.

setFolder

public boolean setFolder(java.io.File folder)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Set the folder to look for ReMixes and remixes.lst in.

Parameters:
folder - A File representing the folder.
Returns:
False if no existing database file was found. This is not a problem, it makes one there.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If folder is invalid, etc.

readListFile

public boolean readListFile()
Read ReMix records from remixes.lst in the folder that has been already set. The old contents of this database are lost.

Returns:
Whether this all succeeded.

saveListFile

public boolean saveListFile()
Save the current database to remixes.lst in the selected folder.

Returns:
Whether this succeeded.

checkMP3sAgainstList

public void checkMP3sAgainstList(boolean forceSaveAfter)
Check the database of records against the mp3 files in the folder, and update the names in the database if mp3s are found with names that are really similar to the known ones.

Parameters:
forceSaveAfter - If true, saves the list file after doing all this.

doubleUp

public static DoubleFileName[] doubleUp(java.lang.String[] files)
Convert a list of file names to a list of DoubleFileNames that are reduced.

Parameters:
files - A list of mp3 file names.
Returns:
A list of DoubleFileNames, each of which corresponds to one of the given file names.

getRandomMirrorPath

public java.lang.String getRandomMirrorPath()
Get a random mirror from the list that is marked as "use".

Returns:
The mirror's URL; if there are none to choose from, null.
